transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Haan ji sir bataiye.

Customer: Haan sir wo address ka aap kar do na mujhe.

Executive: Kya hai address mein dikkat sir dobara mujhe ek baar explain kijiye aapko main bata raha hun aapka jo address hai wo.

Customer: Address mein dekh mere ko problem ye aa raha hai ki koi bhi agar IndiaMART open karke waha pe search kar raha hai near by unki city koi unka kuch bhi hoga samajh lo wo Pune mein hai to near by agar wo search kar raha hai to usko Mumbai ka hi aa raha hai usme.

Executive: Ye main problem yahi ho raha hai mere sath.

Executive: Ek ek minute rukiyega aapka jo address hai abhi currently wo house number 121 orden factory road at post petrol pump thana.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Ka Bhandara thana petrol pump branch post office thane aur Shahpur thane 441906 Maharashtra India sahi hai.

Customer: Wo thane thane nahi hai isliye aapko problem ho raha hai wo thana hai.

Executive: Aur ye ye pin code galat hai yaha pe.

Customer: Pin code sahi hai sir 441906.

Executive: Ek minute.

Executive: Theek hai.

Executive: Sir yaha pe jab main pin code dal raha hun na google pe.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: To thana likha hua sirf nahi thane likha hua nahi aa raha hai aur thana hai na thana nahi aa raha hai sirf Bhandara of sub office Bhandara Maharashtra aise karke aa raha hai.

Customer: Haan to 06 jo hai wahi mere mere ko wo pin code ka jo location aa raha hai mere ko wahi location usme chahiye bas ek minute aur jo thana aur thane mein hi waha pe confusion hua hai sir.

Executive: Aur ye aapka jo GST hai GST portal pe waha pe thana likha hua hai thana T H A N A thana.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Thana Bhandara aur ye to sirf aapko kya karna hai ye thane wale ke jagah pe jaha pe thane likha hua hai waha pe thana kar dena hai.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Theek hai ek kaam kijiyega kya aap boliye sir.

Executive: Hello aapke paas aapke paas GST hoga na jo aapne yaha pe attach kiya hua hai starting mein jo aapne provide kiya tha.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Aap mujhe three page ka GST share kar dijiye theek hai aur main yaha pe isko na sahi karwata hun backend team se baat karke sirf thana ko thane ko thana banana hai.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Bas itna hi karna hai aap mujhe GST share kijiye sir theek hai na aur issue kya aa raha tha matlab ye aisa tha to dikkat kya aa raha tha kya bata rahe the search karte the to Mumbai leke chala jata tha aapko.

Customer: Haan sir usme wahi problem aa raha tha.

Executive: Theek hai aur overall usme usme koi bhi agar search karta tha to wo Mumbai hi dikha raha hai waha pe kyuki waha pe aapne thane kiye hai na.

Customer: Hmm nahi to aapka koi naam search karega tab ya fir koi product search karega tab.

Customer: Haan theek hai par mere location jaisa bhi mere paas mein 40 kilometer mein Nagpur hai theek hai.

Executive: Hmm.

Customer: Nagpur mein agar koi search karta hai near by instant chip manufacturer to usme mera naam aana chahiye na wo wo kaisa unko Nagpur mein dikhai nahi de raha hai wo wo sab kahan dikh raha hai wo Mumbai Vasai Bihar udhar mein jo search kar rahe hain unko barabar dikh raha hai wo kyuki waha pe thana ki jagah pe thane hai.

Executive: Koi nahi wo to sahi hum karwa denge lekin agar main baat karu ki Mumbai mein to waha pe nahi aapki company abhi jo listing de rahi hai na wo Shahpur ke page pe de rahi hai.

Executive: Shahpur ke page pe jo hai aapki listing top mein rahega.

Customer: To sir wahi to hai Shahpur Mumbai samajh rahe hain bahut log aapke aapko maine message bhi bheja tha ek baar beech mein.

Executive: Haan aapne message bheja tha but sir main Mumbai mein bhi Mumbai ke paas mein bhi ek Shahpur hai.

Customer: To wo logo ko yahi lagta hai ki wo Shahpur hai karke waha se wo order kar rahe hain.

Executive: Ek second call ko hold pe rakh sakte hain kya ek second aap call ek second hold pe rakhiyega haan.

Customer: Theek hai.

Executive: [inaudible]

(silence)
summary:
Concerns:

- Address showing Mumbai when searching nearby.

- Pin code showing Bhandara instead of Thana.

- Company listing on Shahpur page.



Resolution:

- Asked customer to share GST for correction.

- Executive will get it corrected from backend team.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to share GST document.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- address, gst, location, thana, shahpur
